byline.contributor: Rami Nazzal contributed reporting from Nablus, West Bank

abstract: Israeli police say Palestinian man Mohammad Abu Amsha tried to stab border officers after claiming to be ill and in need of medical help; it is third attempt by a Palestinian to stab Israelis in West Bank in as many days; attacks do not seem coordinated by any group.
lead_paragraph: The man, identified by the police as Mohammad Abu Amsha, 26, was the third Palestinian to try to stab Israelis in the West Bank since Saturday.

headline.main: Palestinian Man Fatally Shot in Confrontation With Israeli Police
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; West Bank: Palestinian Killed at Border

snippet: The man, identified by the police as Mohammad Abu Amsha, 26, was the third Palestinian to try to stab Israelis in the West Bank since Saturday.
